Title: Presentation To PDF
Description: A simple ppt / pptx to PDF converter that converts PowerPoint presentations in batch.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A simple ppt / pptx to PDF converter that converts PowerPoint presentations in batch.


Details

Built with:

  • C#
  • WPF

Features:

  • MS PowerPoint presentations (ppt & pptx) to PDF.
  • MS Word documents (doc & docx) to PDF
  • Batch conversion.

Requirements:

  • Microsoft Office (PowerPoint needed)
  • Microsoft's .NET Framework 4.5 or later (comes with most Windows systems)

Links:

  • .NET Framework: http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=40773
TagList: .NET,C#,WPF,PowerPoint,PDF,ppt,pptx,ppt to pdf,presentation to pdf,pdf conversion,doc to pdf,
